name: Stupid Cupid <3
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

  • WASD to move.
  • Aim with mouse.
  • Left click and hold to shoot.
  • Shoot at least two people to make the fall in love!
  • BUT! They must like each others gender.
  • Also, there might e people who want more than one partner.

This game was made for the Brackeys 2021 Game Jam  by Edd Diaz (art/animation) and Nef Gonzales (programming).
Music by plaster brain: https://soundcloud.com/plasterbrain/shmeile-vs-saibi-fight-go?in=plasterbrain/se...
It's a very early prototype but hey it is what it is, try it if you feel so inclined.
